entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
